text: Tan Qiang (; born 16 September 1998) is a Chinese badminton player. In 2015, he won the bronze medal at the Asia Junior Championships in the boys' doubles event partnered with Ren Xiangyu, and in 2016, won the silver medal partnered with He Jiting. In 2017, he became the runner-up at the China International Challenge tournament in the mixed doubles event partnered with Xu Ya. == Achievements == === Asian Junior Championships === Boys' doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! The BWF World Tour are divided into six levels, namely World Tour Finals, Super 1000, Super 750, Super 500, Super 300 (part of the HSBC World Tour), and the BWF Tour Super 100.
